reviewText: CDs did not work in any of my players.  I sent it back for a refund.

I haven't listened/watched this yet so ignore the stars (I had to click on a star to continue).  I just want to alert people to the fact that on audible.com (which is part of Amazon), you can get this course (audible version only) for one "credit" (which is essentially $15) or $29.36 if you are a member; or for the "regular" price of $41.95.  Mind you, this is audible only.  This course is published by The Great Courses.  They recommend the best format for each of their courses and for this one there is no difference given between listening or watching, other than that you would possess a DVD if you bought the DVD :)...for the price of $374.95.  I just wanted to point this out.
